reviews.review_msg: Prof Bullock is an amazing teacher, her lectures are always super engaging and I love everything about how she structured/formatted this online course. I've taken two classes with her and always leave with my ideas being challenged in a good way. However, she supports generative AI and even incorporated it into course modules, which was unfortunate

This was a fully online course about law and sexuality. Each learning module was interesting. The grading criteria was easy to understand with 60% of your grade coming from discussion, quizzes and easy learning activities for each week. The class was interesting. Would recommend giving yourself a few days to complete each learning module.
